abstract: Michigan Legislature expels Representative Cindy Gamrat and accepts resignation of Representative Todd Courser after extramarital affair and failed cover-up is exposed.
lead_paragraph: One was expelled and another resigned after they outraged the Legislature with an extramarital affair and a botched attempt to conceal it.

headline.main: Michigan: Lawmakers Out of Jobs After Email Plot
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Lawmakers Out of Jobs After Email Plot

snippet: One was expelled and another resigned after they outraged the Legislature with an extramarital affair and a botched attempt to conceal it.
